text: Time to find another card to replace HSBC revo. Any suggestion to combo with my Citi+amaze card 🤣
Bro. Hsbc revolution latest news came as a shock to me
HSBC Revolution nerf is shocking everyone!

Wah you got live update from mr Terry
Can just keep lor no need to cancel
Ya keep but no using it unless HSBC U-turn it haha

Seem like OCBC mo sign up promotion
Now wee mostly Citibank's card got signups promotion
you were never awarded 10x pts for this before
I though insert card into the machine can transact as a payment?
1 year time can get SUB 😊
Any credit card that I can go for miles?
so basically its for online purchase only
Kelvin so nice to reply his every question
they're probably going to phase out this card soon as the rewards gets worse
Haha and ppl still think banks wouldn't do such a crazy nerf stunt
Exactly lol  that’s why my “hypothetical” question wasn’t without basis. It’s just a matter of when. I wonder who called CSO about the mcc that’s why they nerf contactless spending
hm  ppl also also mcc for online spending ah. Anyway dun think ask mcc has anything to do with the nerf
Someone mentioned calling CSO to check mcc causes nerf 🤷‍♂️
Is hsbc everyday account 1% bonus interest that need 5 minimum transactions including money transfer to my non hsbc account ?
Are there any SGQR apps that still work that can charge a CC?  Looking to pay at hawker stalls… Fave and Shopback aren’t listed  so not sure what else is left 🤔
Amex pay. I'm having KF card so no transfer fee.
Revo contactless nerf but if I insist of asking the merchant to use the physical card through the terminal  do I get cb ? Sounds like a stupid qn but ya so how
contactless payment nerf is the most stupidest thing tho.
physical card never get to begin with
the illustration got put your example
It basically an online only card but without the option to link to amaze
Huh hadn’t considered Amex - UOB PRVI has an Amex version for 1.4mpd  and was thinking of getting PRVI anyway
I'm not sure amex pay can use with UOB amex. I think it's for amex cards only.
amex pay can only use amex card from amex
Uob priv can’t use Amex pay
Rmb that HSBC can transfer to krisflyer for free till Jan 2025. Collect rewards den zao!
Think now is 2.5 points to 1 krisflyer miles
No longer a min of 10k reward point?
Now got promo till end Jan 2025
Oh no. Oops. Haha u got till Jan to  earn. At least it’s not blocks of 25k right?
Min 25k i think  after that no need
For Citi payall when pay for town council  the name field is it suppose to be the owner name or other name also can ?
Min is 10k miles (25k pts)  not 10k points
Is there a reason my UOB UNI$ is zero? We've been spending on that monthly $500-1000 and hitting the min to get the rebates + One bonus interest but when I checked the app  there's no UNI$
Which card did u spend on? My uni$ seems more or less correct.
Yes I did. Is there a general min spend I need for uni$ merchants? I know some like giant require a min spend
UOB One card. Do the uni$ expire? Cos honestly I've only checked it recently though we've had it for 3 years
UOB One card earn cashback quarterly if you fulfill requirements. No UNI$.
Oh goodness 😂 thank you for clarifying
